properties.description: Jisr | جسر is a SaaS-based Human Resources Services company headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, with 301 employees and $60M in funding. Founded in 2016, it offers a cloud platform for HR management, compliance with Saudi labor law, payroll automation, and employee engagement, serving the local market with a focus on digital HR solutions.
properties.content:
[REQUEST A DEMO](https://jisr.net/en/request-demo)

# Where HR and Finance move as one

Meet Jisr: A new-age platform for growing businesses to scale HR processes, manage talent and control spend.

[REQUEST A DEMO](https://jisr.net/en/request-demo)

Trusted by 4500+ HR and Finance teams in Saudi Arabia

## End the silos, bridge HR and Finance with Jisr

## Where workforce strategy meets financial control

[**Core HR suite**\
\
Centralize and streamline your people data, payroll, compliance and HR operations.](https://jisr.net/en/hr-software)

[HR](https://jisr.net/en/human-resource-management) [Payroll](https://jisr.net/en/payroll-management) [Time and Attendance](https://jisr.net/en/attendance-management) [Compliance](https://jisr.net/en/saudi-compliance-management)

[**Talent suite**\
\
Hire top talent, engage your employees, upskill your workforce and build a path to grow for your top performers.](https://jisr.net/en/talent-management)

[Recruitment](https://jisr.net/en/ats-system) [Performance](https://jisr.net/en/employee-performance-management) [Engagement](https://jisr.net/en/employee-engagement) [Learning](https://jisr.net/en/learning-management-system)

[**Spend suite**\
\
Never lose track of any employee expense. Control overspending, enforce policies, and reconcile automatically.](https://jisr.net/en/spend-management)

[Travel](https://jisr.net/en/travel-management) [Expense](https://jisr.net/en/expense-management) [Cards](https://jisr.net/en/card-management-system)

## Built in Saudi, made for MENA

### Local salary data for fair compensation

Leverage pay data for Saudi workforce and ensure fair compensation for all.

### Localized for continuous compliance

Stay compliant with GOSI, Muqeem, WPS, Mudad and more from day one.

### Local salary data for fair compensation

Leverage pay data for Saudi workforce and ensure fair compensation for all.

### Localized for continuous compliance

Stay compliant with GOSI, Muqeem, WPS, Mudad and more from day one.

## Hear why 4500+ customers trust Jisr

#### "What’s most impressive about Jisr is its continuous updates that align with Ministry of Labor regulations, and its outstanding support team. We highly recommend Jisr as the ideal solution for managing all HR processes."

"What’s most impressive about Jisr is its continuous updates that align with Ministry of Labor regulations, and its outstanding support team. We highly recommend Jisr as the ideal solution for managing all HR processes."

Hassan Mahmoud Khairy

Hassan Mahmoud Khairy

HR Director at Fatoor Faris

HR Director at Fatoor Faris

#### "An excellent platform that I strongly recommend to every HR professional. Jisr boosts employee satisfaction, enhances transparency and accessibility of information, saves valuable time, effort, and costs."

"An excellent platform that I strongly recommend to every HR professional. Jisr boosts employee satisfaction, enhances transparency and accessibility of information, saves valuable time, effort, and costs."

Ahmed bin Abdulmeniem Al-Harbi

Ahmed bin Abdulmeniem Al-Harbi

HR Manager Cosmoplast

HR Manager Cosmoplast

#### "Before Jisr App, our expense process was an absolute nightmare of missing receipts and endless email chains. Now, it's seamless. We've saved countless hours and finally have a clear picture of our spending."

"Before Jisr App, our expense process was an absolute nightmare of missing receipts and endless email chains. Now, it's seamless. We've saved countless hours and finally have a clear picture of our spending."

Hussein Al-Shehri

Hussein Al-Shehri

HR Director at Burj Hamam Restaurants

HR Director at Burj Hamam Restaurants

#### “I can confidently say that Jisr strengthened our relationship with employees and brought transparency to all HR processes. Tasks that used to take days are now completed within hours, allowing us to focus on building a better workplace.”

“I can confidently say that Jisr strengthened our relationship with employees and brought transparency to all HR processes. Tasks that used to take days are now completed within hours, allowing us to focus on building a better workplace.”

Faisal Yahya Al-Dhafar

Faisal Yahya Al-Dhafar

HR Director at DSS

HR Director at DSS

## Built for Enterprise, made without complexity

#### Ready to use integrations with top ERPs and accounting systems

Reduce errors, save time and get real-time visibility into payroll costs. With Jisr, sync payroll data into your GL with zero manual effort.

[LEARN MORE](https://jisr.net/en/integrations)

#### One platform for endless customizations and unlimited possibilities

Customize your workflows, personalize your policies and manage complex org structures across entities, projects, employees, departments and more.

[LEARN MORE](https://jisr.net/en/request-demo)

#### Expert HR and Finance support and services, just for you

From instant support and Business Reviews to professional services, an army of 200+ professionals in Riyadh, Dammam, and Jeddah are ready for you.

[LEARN MORE](https://jisr.net/en/request-demo)

#### Ready to use integrations with top ERPs and accounting systems

Reduce errors, save time and get real-time visibility into payroll costs. With Jisr, sync payroll data into your GL with zero manual effort.

[LEARN MORE](https://jisr.net/en/integrations)

#### One platform for endless customizations and unlimited possibilities

Customize your workflows, personalize your policies and manage complex org structures across entities, projects, employees, departments and more.

[LEARN MORE](https://jisr.net/en/request-demo)

#### Expert HR and Finance support and services, just for you

From instant support and Business Reviews to professional services, an army of 200+ professionals in Riyadh, Dammam, and Jeddah are ready for you.

[LEARN MORE](https://jisr.net/en/request-demo)

## Made for the future of work

No special training required for employees to get started

A system so easy to use, your employees will love it!

We’ve built Jisr to be intuitive, which means your employees don’t have to go through long training cycles to request a leave or report their attendance.

Always connected for day-to-day updates – and the big moments

Always connected for day-to-day updates – and the big moments

Whether it’s clocking in and out, finding the perfect spot for your next team lunch, or celebrating birthdays and work anniversaries — Jisr keeps you effortlessly connected with your people.

No special training required for employees to get started

We’ve built Jisr to be intuitive, which means your employees don’t have to go through long training cycles to request a leave or report their attendance.

Always connected for day-to-day updates – and the big moments

Whether it’s clocking in and out, finding the perfect spot for your next team lunch, or celebrating birthdays and work anniversaries — Jisr keeps you effortlessly connected with your people.

## From HR to Finance, Jisr is here for you

##### HR Admins

Simplify and manage every stage of your employees’ lifecycle without constant manual work.

##### HR Managers

Scale and automate your HR operations and employee processes to drive HR efficiency.

##### CHRO

Get real-time visibility into your workforce data and make data-driven employee decisions.

##### Managers

Enforce policies without remembering and redirect employees to a smooth HR and payroll experience.

##### Payroll Managers

Run effortless payroll, from pay calculations to payroll accounting.

##### Employees

Empower your employees with self-service tools and intuitive mobile app to free your HR team from repetitive tasks.

company.name: Jisr | جسر
company.about:
What is Jisr: 

Cloud-Based Platform to manage your People, designed according to the local needs and compatible Saudi Labour Law. Jisr provides a different digital experience for your employees and Helps you Automate lots of Admin work so you can focus on your People.

How does Jisr work?

Flexible and single platform to manage All employees Data, Compliance with Saudi Labor Law, Automated payroll, Reports that Support Business Decisions, Financial Data integrated into your Accounting System. Effective performance management, custom reports, and more.

Why choose Jisr?
Join +3000 Saudi companies that trust Jisr. With +350,000 employees in +16 industries managed by the Jisr platform every workday.

Additional web search results confirm the headquarters address as Raden Commercial Center, Olaya Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and other sources list Riyadh as the location. Therefore the company is headquartered in KSA and satisfies the criterion.

evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile describes Jisr as a Human Resources Services company that provides a "Cloud‑Based Platform" for managing people, which is the typical SaaS model. The categories list includes "hr solutions" and the description explicitly states it is a cloud‑based, software‑as‑a‑service solution. Therefore, Jisr operates in the SaaS industry.

properties.description: Khazna is a SaaS financial services company and digital benefits app that offers salary advances, micro-loans, and digital payments to corporate employees through a mobile platform; 258 employees, founded 2019, headquartered in Saudi Arabia, with $64.1M in funding, operating as a fintech Super App.
properties.content:
![](https://khazna.app/assets/icons/khazna_loader.gif)

# خدمات تطبيق خزنة

![](https://khazna.app/assets/svgs/salary.svg)

###### اقبض بدري

تتيح الخدمة للموظف طلب جزء مستحق من الراتب بداية من ٣٠٪ وحتى ١٠٠٪ أي وقت خلال الشهر وفترة سداد المبلغ تصل إلى ١٠ أشهر.

![](https://khazna.app/assets/svgs/bills.svg)

###### ادفع فواتيرك

دفع الفواتير الخاصة بالمستخدم خلال الشهر عن طريق التطبيق دون الحاجة إلى استخدام النقود الورقية.

![](https://khazna.app/assets/images/features-mobile.png)

![](https://khazna.app/assets/svgs/ic_payroll_circle_inactive.svg)

###### مفردات المرتب

الإطلاع علي مفردات المرتب وكل التفاصيل التي تخص مرتبك بكل سهولة وبخطوات بسيطة وسريعة من خلال التطبيق

![](https://khazna.app/assets/svgs/instalments.svg)

###### عروض التقسيط

تقسيط الأجهزة الكهربائية والسلع المعمرة والخدمات المتنوعة من مجموعة من المتاجر الكبرى بدون مقدم أو فوائد أو أي رسوم إضافية.

تواصل معنا

# كارت خزنة

# مزايا اخرى

![](https://khazna.app/assets/svgs/security.svg)

###### الأمان

معاملات مالية آمنة

![](https://khazna.app/assets/svgs/customer-service.svg)

###### خدمة العملاء

خدمة العملاء متاحة طوال الأسبوع طبقًا للمواعيد المحددة

![](https://khazna.app/assets/svgs/company.svg)

###### تلبية احتياجات الشركة

تخصيص خدمات مالية تناسب احتياجات الشركة

تواصل معنا

###### خزنة هي شركة مصرية هدفها تحسين وتوسيع نطاق الخدمات المالية للمصريين عن طريق تطبيق الهاتف المحمول, هدفنا هو توفير خدمات بسيطة و مريحة تساعد المستخدمين على سداد التزاماتهم بدون ضغوط أو أعباء وعلى الإدخار مما يساعد على تحقيق الأمان المالي ونشر الثقافة المالية

company.name: Khazna
company.about: Khazna is a leading financial Super App that offers easy-to-use, technology-driven financial services to the underserved segments. Khazna’s services include salary and pension advances, the Khazna prepaid card, and bill payments. The company’s vision is to provide formal financial services to people who lack access and to digitize cash transactions across Egypt & KSA. Khazna is led by a management team boasting decades of cumulative experience in technology, banking and financial services.

evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile lists Khazna’s workforce as 258 employees, which falls within the required range of 201 to 500 employees.

Has $64.1M in total funding, last round was a Series B in 2025-02-04. Khazna is a digital benefits app, offering corporate employees financial solutions through a mobile application. evaluations.criterion: Operates in the SaaS (Software as a Service) industry
evaluations.reasoning: Khazna is described as a digital benefits app that delivers financial services to corporate employees through a mobile application.  The internal company profile states it is a “digital benefits app” and a “financial Super App” that provides technology‑driven financial services, which implies a cloud‑based software platform delivered over the internet.  The TechCrunch article further describes Khazna as a fintech startup that offers salary advances, digital payments, micro‑loans, and other financial services via a mobile app, confirming that its core product is a software service accessed online.  These facts indicate that Khazna operates as a SaaS (Software as a Service) company.

[Hala](https://hala.com/)

المنتجات

## المنتجات

اكتشف منتجات مبتكرة مصمّمة خصيصاً لأعمالك، من الحسابات البنكية إلى المدفوعات، إدارة المصروفات، التمويل والمزيد.

الدفع والتحويل

[بطاقات فيزا ومدى](https://hala.com/ar/products/payments/hala-debit-card) [بطاقات المصروفات](https://hala.com/ar/products/expense-management) [سداد](https://hala.com/ar/products/payments/sadad) [تحويلات الآيبان](https://hala.com/ar/products/payments/local-transfers) [تحويلات المحفظة](https://hala.com/ar/products/payments/wallet-to-wallet)

نبذة عن هلا

## نبذة عن هلا

نبني بنك المستقبل للمنشآت الصغيرة والمتوسطة لتمكينها من تنمية أعمالها وإدارتها عبر حلول مالية وتقنية متطورة.

حساب الأعمال الذي يعطيك تسوية فورية للمبيعات إلى حسابك، مع قبول وإرسال المدفوعات والتحكم في المصروفات والحصول على التمويل لتنمية منشأتك، وكلّ ذلك من منصة واحدة.

# موثوق من قبل الشركات الصغيرة والمتوسطة

هلا هي الحل البسيط والموثوق لإدارة الشؤون المالية للشركات الصغيرة في المملكة العربية السعودية. من المدفوعات إلى المشتريات والتمويل، نحن نغطي كل شيء.

#### 100,000 شركة صغيرة ومتوسطة

التجار يستخدمون هلا يوميًا

####  20 مليار

حجم المعاملات المعالجة

#### مرخصة من البنك المركزي السعودي (ساما)

مؤسسة مالية مرخصة بالكامل في السعودية

هلا هي منصة تقنية مالية رائدة تهتم بتمكين المنشآت الصغيرة والمتوسطة من إدارة إيراداتهم .ومدفوعاتهم بطريقة سهلة وآمنة

evaluations.criterion: Operates in the SaaS (Software as a Service) industry
evaluations.reasoning: The Hala website and internal profile describe it as a fintech platform that provides online banking accounts, card issuance, payments, expense management, and POS financing for SMEs. The product pages and company description emphasize a cloud‑based, web‑accessible service that is subscription‑like (e.g., “All‑in‑One Business Account for SMEs”). The company’s tech stack (docker, react, cloud‑native services) and external coverage (e.g., “cloud‑native payments platform” in news articles) confirm that the software is hosted in the cloud and accessed over the internet. These characteristics match the SaaS definition of software delivered via the web, managed by the provider, and typically billed on a recurring basis. Therefore, Hala operates in the SaaS industry.

What is a fintech SaaS company?
What is Fintech SaaS? Fintech SaaS is a kind of model where financial businesses, startups, or service providers deliver financial services and solutions through software applications via cloud-based platforms.

references.title: FinTech Strategy
references.snippet:
What is the fintech strategy of Saudi Arabia?
The Kingdom aims to position itself as a global FinTech hub, fostering innovation, financial inclusion, and economic diversification. With initiatives supporting startups, digital payments, open banking, and blockchain, Saudi Arabia is creating a future-ready financial ecosystem.
